tool_description: Reactivates suspended accounts with conditional requirements and access restoration procedures.

reactivation_type.description: Type of reactivation: full, conditional, probationary

authorization_code.description: Authorization code from appeal decision or manual review

conditions.description: List of conditions that must be met for reactivation

probation_days.description: Duration of probationary period in days (for probationary reactivation)

restore_privileges.description: List of privileges to restore: basic_access, purchasing, messaging, reviews, api_access

error_messages: Account not suspended: Cannot reactivate an account that is not currently suspended.
Invalid authorization: authorization_code is not valid or has expired.
Invalid reactivation type: Use one of [full, conditional, probationary].
Unmet conditions: One or more required conditions for reactivation have not been satisfied.
System restriction: Account cannot be reactivated due to system-level restrictions.
Invalid privilege type: restore_privileges contains unsupported privilege types.
usage: Provide account_id, reactivation_type, and valid authorization_code; specify conditions array and probation_days for conditional/probationary reactivations; list restore_privileges to control access levels.

reactivation_id.description: Unique identifier for this reactivation action

status.description: Reactivation status: completed, failed, partial, pending_conditions

effective_date.description: Date and time when reactivation became effective

active_restrictions.description: List of any remaining restrictions on the account

probation_end_date.description: End date of probationary period if applicable
